mapper.select: SELECT acs.id as server_id, acs.name as server_name, acs.addr, acb.id as broker_id, acb.name as broker_name, acb.logo FROM t_ac_server acs INNER JOIN t_ac_broker acb ON acs.broker = acb.id WHERE acs.id IN #{id} AND acs.del = 0 AND acb.del = 0
